solution_line_template: The federal government takes out {federal_tax_fraction}*{salary_per_week}=<<{federal_tax_fraction}*{salary_per_week}={federal_tax_amount}>>{federal_tax_amount} dollars.

Then the final amount remaining after all the deductions are removed is {salary_per_week}-{federal_tax_amount}-{state_tax_amount}-{health_insurance}-{life_insurance}-{parking_fee}=<<{salary_per_week}-{federal_tax_amount}-{state_tax_amount}-{health_insurance}-{life_insurance}-{parking_fee}={final_paycheck_amount}>>{final_paycheck_amount} dollars
